issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.aliyundrive.com/s/rSYYcgb5PWr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aliyundrive.com%2Fs%2FrSYYcgb5PWr) ### Comment Username: @zoumutou > 开启了AdGuard后，所有的阿里云盘的分享都会提示你打开的链接有误。 > 但在关掉AdGuard后，或在没有启用AdGuard的其他Safari账户里同一个链接就能正常打开。 > 这个问题在同一台电脑、相同AdGuard配置的edge浏览器里就没有。无论开启AdGuard与否，阿里云的分享链接都是能正常打开的。 > 同时，在使用了AdGuard的手机端Safari里面也没有这个问题。 ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> Hello,  你好， @zoumutou
> 
> This issue is caused by Fanboy's Annoyances filter, please turn it off or add to user rules:此问题是由Fanboy的烦恼过滤器引起的，请关闭或添加到用户规则中： `@@||api.aliyundrive.com/*/share_link/`

可以了，感谢！

issue.title: "AdGuard - Annoyances >>> AdGuard - Other Annoyances", has errors with DeviantArt.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.52.0 on Chrome 117.0.5938.89 (64 bits)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.deviantart.com/somebody2978/art/Cammy-and-Chun-Li-in-England-1994-FullHD-867428983

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. "AdGuard - Annoyances -> AdGuard - Other Annoyances", has errors with DeviantArt. When you enter any image publication, you scroll down, the page creates that error and deletes the suggestions of other publications.

2. Screenshots
https://images2.imgbox.com/ff/56/rxpmZv5F_o.jpg

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This is happening to me too.

This appears to be caused by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7e282b7261f4c889075d29bbce8913a46fe1a1f7 which was introduced as part of https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157292.  I'm not able to figure out enough about how filter rules work to know why, but when digging into the logger I see the rule that was introduced by that PR.

I've been able to replicate the issue rather reliably.  I don't need to be logged in to replicate it.  I just need to scroll down after a page with artwork on it finishes loading and the sidebar is replaced with the error message and the ns binding error shows up.  This is on firefox 117.0.1 so it seems to not be dependent on the browser used (since OP was using chrome).
